column5: With a little help from Dad!  Off the dock at the family cottage last weekend.  My wife came over the snap a few pics of us fishing.  And just so happened to catch Alex's first fist on camera.  Hook set and all!  Alex's favorite part about fishing is chewing on the rod handle.   We (I) felt some taps, so I pulled rod out of his mouth, and set the hook!  He was pretty interested in this little sun fish!
Ah so the fish were off the dock. LOL  Awesome Nick.
#####...so I pulled rod out of his mouth, and set the hook!  ...#####  Funniest thing I've read in a loooong time
Awesome , events such as this are great memories !!
Everyone knows that the mouth is much more sensitive than the hands. The kids got talent, why did I not think of that?
Thanks guys!  I'm gunna enjoy these times while I can.  Soon he will be out fishing me!
Nice.... Start them early. My 10yr old daughter out fished me last sat & Sunday.(With a little help  )
Nice story Nick.  If chewing on the rod handle catches fish - GO FOR IT!!
